hero.name: Borys
hero.title: Computer Scientist & AI Specialist
hero.description: I develop solutions that integrate systems, make data usable, and deploy AI productively.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a computer science graduate and developer focused on AI-powered solutions, frontend and backend development. I enjoy solving complex problems pragmatically, building things cleanly, and turning knowledge directly into working products. I love what I do and stay curious - that's why I continuously learn new things and experiment with modern tools and methods.

jobs.description: Development of AI-powered solutions for IT service management
achievements: Developed a GDPR-compliant pseudonymization pipeline for ServiceNow CSV exports with deterministic seed initialization and parallelization (multiprocessing) while ensuring cross-table referential integrity
Developed an LLM evaluator with Composite Quality Index (CQI) and NLI checks for benchmarking Now-Assist responses
Designed prompts, guardrails, and monitoring for Now Assist (GenAI) in ITSM
Standardized internal authentication by replacing third-party tools with a custom-developed LDAP client in C#
Provided REST/CLI interface for service integrations

items.thesis: Bachelor Thesis: Privacy-compliant ITSM process support through generative and agent-based AI based on the ServiceNow platform

items.name: Python
items.description: Data pipelines with pandas, CLI tools, asynchronous jobs, ML/NLP workflows with Hugging Face Transformers and PyTorch, NumPy

items.name: Software Modeling and Architecture
items.description: UML, sequence and ER diagrams, architecture styles, API design, modular services, prototyping, requirements analysis and decomposition

items.name: SQL
items.description: Schema design, multi-table joins, window functions, indexing and query plan basics, PostgreSQL, MySQL

items.name: DevOps
items.description: Git, GitHub and GitLab, CI basics, Docker, Kubernetes basics, MLOps basics, Linux, scripting

items.name: Amazon Web Services
items.description: Cloud basics in provisioning, networking, access control, simple deployments and monitoring

items.name: C++
items.description: Practical knowledge in tooling and prototype development

items.name: LLM Fine-Tuning
items.description: Dataset curation and cleaning, instruction tuning with Hugging Face Transformers and PEFT/LoRA/QLoRA, prompt templates and tokenization, training/validation pipelines

items.name: Java
items.description: OOP, REST backends, Spring basics, unit tests

items.name: ServiceNow
items.description: Workflows, Flow Designer and IntegrationHub, Business Rules and Script Includes, service catalog, REST integrations, Now Assist (GenAI) integration

items.name: React (+ TypeScript)
items.description: Vite apps, component design, Tailwind CSS/shadcn/ui, responsive layouts, API integration

items.name: C#
items.description: Practical knowledge in .NET console tools and utilities

items.name: ServiceNow Data Anonymization Tool
items.description: Provided GDPR-compliant test data, measured by error-free ServiceNow imports with preserved referential integrity, through modular Python anonymizer with deterministic seeding and multiprocess pipelines.
achievements: Full PII coverage, measurable by precise masking of names, emails, phone numbers, addresses and companies even in free text, through combination of regex and NLP
Reproducibility ensured, measured by consistent repeat runs and validations, through seed-based anonymization and robust export workflows
Result: Enabled GDPR-compliant test data generation for development and test environments, with preserved referential integrity and data structure

items.name: Now Assist Evaluator
items.description: Standardized AI response quality, measured via a confidence-based Composite Quality Index, by building a four-stage evaluator on semantic, pragmatic, lexical and structural levels.
achievements: Increased analysis capability, measurable by CSV exports per stage and overall score, through stable export modules
Scaled throughput, measured by efficient NLI processing and better GPU utilization, through integration of Transformers with batching and lazy loading
Result: Accelerated enterprise-specific AI integration, measurable by shorter integration cycles and less rework, through task-weighted scores, prompts and guardrails for Now Assist in ITSM

items.name: Sparrow LDAP Client
items.description: Standardized internal authentication, measured by complete replacement of third-party tools, through development of standalone LDAP client in C# with Bind/Search/Add/Modify/Delete and desktop GUI.
achievements: Reduced onboarding effort, measurable by faster bulk updates, through LDIF/CSV import/export and visual GUI
Automated provisioning, measured by stable integrations in services, through provided REST and CLI interfaces
Result: Standardized LDAP access across all teams and elimination of third-party tool dependency

items.authors: Lurin, I., Gorobeiko, M., Sokol, Y., Usenko, O., Khoroshun, E., Makarov, V., Nehoduiko, V., Gumeniuk, K., Gorobeyko, B., & Dinets, A.
